events.title: Create initial POSCAR files for CrSSe, CrSTe, CrSeTe monolayers
events.details: Step in workflow: Computational Workflow for Strain-Dependent Magnetic Properties in Janus CrXY Monolayers

events.title: Relax Janus CrXY monolayers to find equilibrium structure, preserving magnetic ordering
events.details: 2D Janus monolayer, Cr-based transition metal dichalcogenide, magnetic, broken inversion symmetry, three compounds: CrSSe, CrSTe, CrSeTe

events.title: Generate strained POSCAR by scaling lattice vectors
events.details: Step in workflow: Computational Workflow for Strain-Dependent Magnetic Properties in Janus CrXY Monolayers

events.title: Relax atomic positions under fixed biaxial strain, preserve magnetic ordering
events.details: Strained 2D Janus monolayer, biaxial strain applied, need to relax internal coordinates only

events.title: Calculate magnetic anisotropy energy via force theorem: difference between magnetization along out-of-plane (001) and in-plane (100)...
events.details: Strained Janus monolayer, need accurate MAE with SOC, sensitive to k-point convergence

events.title: Calculate spin-polarized band structure and density of states for strained Janus monolayer
events.details: Strained Janus monolayer, need band gap and spin-polarized electronic structure

events.title: Calculate total energies of different magnetic configurations to extract Heisenberg exchange parameters J1, J2, J3
events.details: Strained Janus monolayer, need exchange couplings for Monte Carlo, use supercell with different spin arrangements
